system.description:
All magic is divine, and you have become a true emissary of that divine will.  You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain the other Otherworldly Defense option that you do not already possess.
  • You gain one of the options from A Blessing or a Curse that you do not already possess.
  • Whenever you finish a long rest, you automatically gain the benefit of a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.3zt20n8mf29x3eju]{Death Ward}spell.
  • You gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ljixftygfhi0sfsf]{Guidance} cantrip if you do not already have it, or another witch or cleric cantrip if you do, and it does not count against your number of cantrips known.  When applying guidance to a religion or arcana skill check, the size of the expertise die increases by one step and the maximum size for an expertise die on that check is 1d10.
